question: The important landmark "Great Hall of the People" is located in which nation?
explanation: Great Hall of the People is an important landmark-tourist attraction of China. This state-building host's various activities of the Chinese Government and Communist Party of China. It was opened in 1959 as one of the "Ten Great Constructions of China". This building is the political hub of China which is the venue of National People's Congress, the highest organ of state power and national legislature of China.
